channel.title: Something you don't see every day
channel.description:
D4: sheriff, prince, king, MM, reaper and hunter...
hunter got reaped sheriff got wolfed D3 prince poisoned reaper exed in the day MM jail exed
everyone but the king dies
![King%20wins%20gg|690x389](upload://i4IpkXvGnlfFXyQztmxywj3nu7w.png)

item.title: Something you don't see every day
item.dc:creator: Arinya
item.description:
ah the wolfed sheriff

@Htm Yes, the king was neutral. (The BD, Unseen and Cult kings win with their faction so they are never mentioned alone.)

@Icibalus You are probably right, but since this is a Gallery I found it more fitting here even though game pictures aren’t mentioned in the title.

Read full topic
item.source: Something you don't see every day
